divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my garage at the night sky as I only smoke my cigarettes in our garage and seen what appeared to be a firework of some sort, I thought this one will fizzle, but it continued to move,made a sizzle sound but yet continued to move west towards Cincinnati from Amelia East Fork area, as I stood up and got a better look it appeared to be a size of a small rocket on fire but yet still moving. As in a searing repetition, like it was getting stuck? I called out OH MY GOD! What IS that! Watched til it disappeared quickly. I ran inside and told my son and husband hoping they wouldn't think I have lost my mind.
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
Summary: Moved upwards at an angle heading west
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around October 22nd 2008
